title: Cyberspace Cyberpunks
subtitle: Virtual, Augmented, Mixed Reality
description: "Like the word 'cyberspace', the term 'virtual reality' (VR) is now commonly used for any space created by or accssible through computers, ranging from the 3D world of a game to the Internet as an alternate 'virtual' reality constructed by a vast networked communication space." Christiane Paul (Curator of New Media Arts at the Whitney Museum of American Art). In this tutorial we'll learn about Cyberspace's history, as well as how to make it using WebVR/XR and <a-frame>
